snippet.title: Tamriel Rebuilt Version 19.12 Released
snippet.description:
Tamriel Rebuilt version 19.12 has been released! 

With our last release, 1807 - Old Ebonheart, we could only show you a glimpse of the lands that Saint Veloth himself once ventured through. Now, we can finally present you the whole region and allow you to see the places where the Saint tamed the tumbling waters of the Thirr River during his great exodus to the Sacred East. Venture through the rich soils and gently flowing waters of Aanthirin, the crossroads of Morrowind.


We'd like to thank Eric Gordon Berg for composing a great piece of music for our official trailer. You can listen to the track ''A World Rebuilt'' over at his Soundcloud:
https://soundcloud.com/ericgordonberg/a-world-rebuilt-tamriel-rebuilt-promo-2019
And secondly we'd like to thank Darkelfguy from Morrowind Modding Showcases for creating the trailer. Check out his channel for Morrowind modding news and great showcases of mods: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTiULQ_bcPRu_jMTZ86WO7A


Visit us at our site: https://www.tamriel-rebuilt.org
Download the mod: https://www.tamriel-rebuilt.org/downloads/main-release
Installation Guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TvKoRflsg4Q 
Learn More: https://www.tamriel-rebuilt.org/about/about-project 
FAQ: https://www.tamriel-rebuilt.org/about/frequently-asked-questions 

Visit us at our social sites:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tamrielrebuilt 
Tumblr: http://tamriel-rebuilt.tumblr.com/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/TamrielRebuilt/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tamrielrebuilt
